Quick search

Rolie-Poly Blend equations¶

Summary¶

class TheoryBlendRoliePoly.TheoryBlendRoliePoly[source]¶

Blend of Rolie-Poly equations for the nonlinear predictions of polydisperse melts

  • Function
    \[\boldsymbol \sigma = G_N^0 \sum_i \text{fene}(\lambda_i) \phi_i \boldsymbol A_i\]
    where
    \[\begin{split}\boldsymbol A_i &= \sum_j \phi_j \boldsymbol A_{ij}\\ \lambda_i &= \left( \dfrac{\text{Tr} \boldsymbol A_i}{3} \right)^{1/2}\\ \stackrel{\nabla}{\boldsymbol A_{ij}} &= -\dfrac{1}{2\tau_{\mathrm d,i}} (\boldsymbol A_{ij} - \boldsymbol I) -\dfrac{2}{\tau_{\mathrm s,i}} \dfrac{\lambda_i - 1}{\lambda_i} \boldsymbol A_{ij} -\left( \dfrac{\beta_\text{th}}{2\tau_{\mathrm d,j}} + \beta_\text{CCR}\dfrac{2}{\tau_{\mathrm s,j}} \dfrac{\lambda_j - 1}{\lambda_j}\lambda_i^{2\delta} \right) (\boldsymbol A_{ij} - \boldsymbol I)\end{split}\]
  • Parameters
    • GN0 \(\equiv G_N^0\): Plateau modulus
    • beta \(\equiv\beta_\text{CCR}\): Rolie-Poly CCR parameter
    • delta \(\equiv\delta\): Rolie-Poly CCR exponent
    • phi_i \(\equiv\phi_i\): Volume fraction of species \(i\)
    • tauD_i \(\equiv\tau_{\mathrm d,i}\): Maxwell relaxation times for the stress of species \(i\) (includes both reptation and constraint release mechamisms)
    • tauR_i \(\equiv\tau_{\mathrm s,i}\): Stretch relaxation time of species \(i\)
